snippet: Six people were shot in a laundromat on the South Side of Chicago on Monday night, the latest outbreak in a wave of gun violence plaguing the city.
abstract: Six people are shot inside a Chicago laundromat, latest outbreak in wave of gun violence plaguing the city; none of the injuries are believed to be life-threatening.
lead_paragraph: Six people were shot in a laundromat on the South Side of Chicago on Monday night, the latest outbreak in a wave of gun violence plaguing the city.

headline.main: Illinois: Six are Shot in Laundromat in Chicago
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Six Are Shot in Laundromat in Chicago
